text: The Hyundai Aslan is a Luxury Sedan made by Hyundai from 2014 to 2017. == History == The Hyundai Aslan was introduced in August 2014. The car was made to compete with other luxury sedans from brands like BMW Audi and Mercedes Benz It was positioned between the Hyundai Grandeur and the Hyundai Genesis The name Aslan means Lion in Turkish the Aslan was equipped with 3.0L and 3.3L V6 gasoline engines and had 6-speed and 8-speed automatic transmissions. == Markets == The Hyundai Aslan was sold only in South Korea in all its production. == Discontinuation == The Hyundai Aslan was discontinued in 2017 due to weak sales and was replaced by the Hyundai Grandeur. Aslan Category:Sedans Category:2010s automobiles
title: Hyundai Aslan
